Bug_Report_0001.Summary: 'Никоим образом' item is incorrectly translated on the user registration page after changing the language to Russian
Bug_Report_0001.Description: 'Никоим образом' item is incorrectly translated on the user registration page after changing the language to Russian

Preconditions.2: The language is changed to Russian

Steps_to_Reproduce.2: Enter valid data in the 'Адресс электронной почты' and 'Пароль' fields
Steps_to_Reproduce.5: Mark the 'Я не являюсь yалоговым резидентом США' checkbox
Steps_to_Reproduce.6: Click any item in the 'Причина открытия аккаунта' page
Pay attention to the 'Никоим образом' item in the 'У вас есть опыт торговли?' page

Bug_Report_0001.Actual_Result: 'Никоим образом' item is incorrectly translated on the user registration page after changing the language to Russian
Bug_Report_0001.Expected_Result: 'Вовсе нет' item is translated on the user registration page after changing the language to Russian
